sentence.Network_en: He has no compunction about relating how he killed his father.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在讲述自己杀害父亲的过程时，没有感到丝毫的内疚。

sentence.Network_en: She felt no compunction about leaving her job.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对自己的辞职一点儿也不感到懊悔。

sentence.Network_en: He felt a kind of compunction.

list.abs: She kept me waiting without the slightest compunction ., 她让我久等却没有丝毫的歉意.
i feel no compunction in doing it ., 做这件事我不感到负疚.
before , I would have held this to be a crime , but now I felt no compunction .以前，我认为这样做是一种罪过，如今我不感到有任何疑虑。
some people can deceive others without compunction .有些人可以毫无顾忌的欺骗他人。
i have little compunction in doing it ., 做这件事我没有什么不安.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French componction, from ecclesiastical Latin compunctio(n-), from Latin compungere 'prick sharply', from com- (expressing intensive force) + pungere 'to prick'

entry.def: If you say that someone has no compunction about doing something, you mean that they do it without feeling ashamed or guilty.

example.ex: He has no compunction about relating how he killed his father.
example.tran: 他在讲述自己杀害父亲的过程时，没有感到丝毫的内疚。

means.word_mean: 1. a feeling of deep regret (usually for some misdeed)

auth_sentence.content: I have no compunction whatsoever to suggesting ideas for science to consider.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have no compunction whatsoever to suggesting ideas for science to consider.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have no compunction whatsoever to suggesting ideas for science to consider.

auth_sentence.content: I saw kids expelled from school illegally without compunction, kids who were suffering from disabilities.
auth_sentence.res_content: I saw kids expelled from school illegally without compunction, kids who were suffering from disabilities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I saw kids expelled from school illegally without compunction, kids who were suffering from disabilities.

auth_sentence.content: If things go wrong they have no compunction about giving police details of the person they are using.
auth_sentence.res_content: If things go wrong they have no compunction about giving police details of the person they are using.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If things go wrong they have no compunction about giving police details of the person they are using.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 严守时刻的,准时的,正点的

pung=punct点,变尖,指,针+ent……的→尖的→尖锐的
acu尖+punct点+ure表名词→用尖[针]点→针炙
com全部+punct点,变尖,指,针+ion表名词→全身像针刺一样→懊悔
punctual[adj.严守时刻的,准时的,正点的]+ity表名词→n.准时
punctuate[v.加标点于;不时打断]+ion表名词→punctuation标点
punct点,变尖,指,针+ure表名词→点[进去]→刺穿
punct点,变尖,指,针+uate=ate表动词→加上点→加标点
punct点,变尖,指,针+ure表名词→点[进去]→刺穿

means.word_mean: 内疚, 后悔, 懊悔
